5#ifndef V8_HEAP_BASE_WORKLIST_H_

16namespace heap::base {
17namespace internal {
18
19class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE SegmentBase {
20 public:
21 static SegmentBase* GetSentinelSegmentAddress();
22
23 explicit constexpr SegmentBase(uint16_t capacity) : capacity_(capacity) {}
24
25 size_t Size() const { return index_; }
26 size_t Capacity() const { return capacity_; }
27 bool IsEmpty() const { return index_ == 0; }
28 bool IsFull() const { return index_ == capacity_; }
29 void Clear() { index_ = 0; }
30
31 protected:
32 const uint16_t capacity_;
33 uint16_t index_ = 0;
34};
35} // namespace internal
36
37class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE WorklistBase final {
38 public:
39 // Enforces predictable order of push/pop sequences in single-threaded mode.
40 static void EnforcePredictableOrder();
41 static bool PredictableOrder() { return predictable_order_; }
42
43 private:
44 static bool predictable_order_;
45};
46
47// A global worklist based on segments which allows for a thread-local
48// producer/consumer pattern with global work stealing.
49//
50// - Entries in the worklist are of type `EntryType`.
51// - Segments have a capacity of at least `MinSegmentSize` but possibly more.
52//
53// All methods on the worklist itself are safe for concurrent usage but only
54// consider published segments. Unpublished work in views using `Local` is not
55// visible.
56template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
57class Worklist final {
58 public:
59 // A thread-local view on the worklist. Any work that is not published from
60 // the local view is not visible to the global worklist.
61 class Local;
62 class Segment;
63
64 static constexpr int kMinSegmentSize = MinSegmentSize;
65
66 Worklist() = default;
67 ~Worklist() { CHECK(IsEmpty()); }
68
69 Worklist(const Worklist&) = delete;
70 Worklist& operator=(const Worklist&) = delete;
71
72 // Returns true if the global worklist is empty and false otherwise. May be
73 // read concurrently for an approximation.
74 bool IsEmpty() const;
75 // Returns the number of segments in the global worklist. May be read
76 // concurrently for an approximation.
77 size_t Size() const;
78
79 // Moves the segments from `other` into this worklist, leaving behind `other`
80 // as empty.
81 void Merge(Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>& other);
82
83 // Removes all segments from the worklist.
84 void Clear();
85
86 // Invokes `callback` on each item. Callback is of type `bool(EntryType&)` and
87 // should return true if the entry should be kept and false if the entry
88 // should be removed.
89 template <typename Callback>
90 void Update(Callback callback);
91
92 // Invokes `callback` on each item. Callback is of type `void(EntryType&)`.
93 template <typename Callback>
94 void Iterate(Callback callback) const;
95
96 private:
97 void Push(Segment* segment);
98 bool Pop(Segment** segment);
99
100 mutable v8::base::Mutex lock_;
101 Segment* top_ = nullptr;
102 std::atomic<size_t> size_{0};
103};
104
105template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
106void Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Push(Segment* segment) {
107 DCHECK(!segment->IsEmpty());
108 v8::base::MutexGuard guard(&lock_);
109 segment->set_next(top_);
110 top_ = segment;
111 size_.fetch_add(1, std::memory_order_relaxed);
112}
113
114template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
115bool Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Pop(Segment** segment) {
116 v8::base::MutexGuard guard(&lock_);
117 if (top_ == nullptr) return false;
118 DCHECK_LT(0U, size_);
119 size_.fetch_sub(1, std::memory_order_relaxed);
120 *segment = top_;
121 top_ = top_->next();
122 return true;
123}
124
125template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
126bool Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::IsEmpty() const {
127 return Size() == 0;
128}
129
130template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
131size_t Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Size() const {
132 // It is safe to read |size_| without a lock since this variable is
133 // atomic, keeping in mind that threads may not immediately see the new
134 // value when it is updated.
135 return size_.load(std::memory_order_relaxed);
136}
137
138template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
139void Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Clear() {
140 v8::base::MutexGuard guard(&lock_);
141 size_.store(0, std::memory_order_relaxed);
142 Segment* current = top_;
143 while (current != nullptr) {
144 Segment* tmp = current;
145 current = current->next();
146 Segment::Delete(tmp);
147 }
148 top_ = nullptr;
149}
150
151template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
152template <typename Callback>
153void Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Update(Callback callback) {
154 v8::base::MutexGuard guard(&lock_);
155 Segment* prev = nullptr;
156 Segment* current = top_;
157 size_t num_deleted = 0;
158 while (current != nullptr) {
159 current->Update(callback);
160 if (current->IsEmpty()) {
161 DCHECK_LT(0U, size_);
162 ++num_deleted;
163 if (prev == nullptr) {
164 top_ = current->next();
165 } else {
166 prev->set_next(current->next());
167 }
168 Segment* tmp = current;
169 current = current->next();
170 Segment::Delete(tmp);
171 } else {
172 prev = current;
173 current = current->next();
174 }
175 }
176 size_.fetch_sub(num_deleted, std::memory_order_relaxed);
177}
178
179template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
180template <typename Callback>
181void Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Iterate(Callback callback) const {
182 v8::base::MutexGuard guard(&lock_);
183 for (Segment* current = top_; current != nullptr; current = current->next()) {
184 current->Iterate(callback);
185 }
186}
187
188template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
189void Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Merge(
190 Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>& other) {
191 Segment* other_top;
192 size_t other_size;
193 {
194 v8::base::MutexGuard guard(&other.lock_);
195 if (!other.top_) return;
196
197 other_top = std::exchange(other.top_, nullptr);
198 other_size = other.size_.exchange(0, std::memory_order_relaxed);
199 }
200
201 // It's safe to iterate through these segments because the top was
202 // extracted from `other`.
203 Segment* end = other_top;
204 while (end->next()) end = end->next();
205
206 {
207 v8::base::MutexGuard guard(&lock_);
208 size_.fetch_add(other_size, std::memory_order_relaxed);
209 end->set_next(top_);
210 top_ = other_top;
211 }
212}
213
214template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
215class Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Segment final
216 : public internal::SegmentBase {
217 public:
218 static Segment* Create(uint16_t min_segment_size) {
219 const auto wanted_bytes = MallocSizeForCapacity(min_segment_size);
220 v8::base::AllocationResult<char*> result;
221 if (WorklistBase::PredictableOrder()) {
222 result.ptr = static_cast<char*>(v8::base::Malloc(wanted_bytes));
223 result.count = wanted_bytes;
224 } else {
225 result = v8::base::AllocateAtLeast<char>(wanted_bytes);
226 }
227 CHECK_NOT_NULL(result.ptr);
228 return new (result.ptr)
229 Segment(CapacityForMallocSize(result.count * sizeof(char)));
230 }
231
232 static void Delete(Segment* segment) { v8::base::Free(segment); }
233
234 V8_INLINE void Push(EntryType entry);
235 V8_INLINE void Pop(EntryType* entry);
236
237 template <typename Callback>
238 void Update(Callback callback);
239 template <typename Callback>
240 void Iterate(Callback callback) const;
241
242 Segment* next() const { return next_; }
243 void set_next(Segment* segment) { next_ = segment; }
244
245 private:
246 static constexpr size_t MallocSizeForCapacity(size_t num_entries) {
247 return sizeof(Segment) + sizeof(EntryType) * num_entries;
248 }
249 static constexpr size_t CapacityForMallocSize(size_t malloc_size) {
250 return (malloc_size - sizeof(Segment)) / sizeof(EntryType);
251 }
252
253 constexpr explicit Segment(size_t capacity)
254 : internal::SegmentBase(capacity) {}
255
256 EntryType& entry(size_t index) {
257 return reinterpret_cast<EntryType*>(this + 1)[index];
258 }
259 const EntryType& entry(size_t index) const {
260 return reinterpret_cast<const EntryType*>(this + 1)[index];
261 }
262
263 Segment* next_ = nullptr;
264};
265
266template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
267void Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Segment::Push(EntryType e) {
268 DCHECK(!IsFull());
269 entry(index_++) = e;
270}
271
272template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
273void Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Segment::Pop(EntryType* e) {
274 DCHECK(!IsEmpty());
275 *e = entry(--index_);
276}
277
278template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
279template <typename Callback>
280void Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Segment::Update(Callback callback) {
281 size_t new_index = 0;
282 for (size_t i = 0; i < index_; i++) {
283 if (callback(entry(i), &entry(new_index))) {
284 new_index++;
285 }
286 }
287 index_ = new_index;
288}
289
290template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
291template <typename Callback>
292void Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Segment::Iterate(
293 Callback callback) const {
294 for (size_t i = 0; i < index_; i++) {
295 callback(entry(i));
296 }
297}
298
299// A thread-local on a given worklist.
300template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
301class Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Local final {
302 public:
303 using ItemType = EntryType;
304
305 explicit Local(Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>& worklist);
306 ~Local();
307
308 // Moving needs to specify whether the `worklist_` pointer is preserved or
309 // not.
310 Local(Local&& other) V8_NOEXCEPT : worklist_(other.worklist_) {
311 std::swap(push_segment_, other.push_segment_);
312 std::swap(pop_segment_, other.pop_segment_);
313 }
314 Local& operator=(Local&&) V8_NOEXCEPT = delete;
315
316 // Having multiple copies of the same local view may be unsafe.
317 Local(const Local&) = delete;
318 Local& operator=(const Local& other) = delete;
319
320 V8_INLINE void Push(EntryType entry);
321 V8_INLINE bool Pop(EntryType* entry);
322
323 bool IsLocalAndGlobalEmpty() const;
324 bool IsLocalEmpty() const;
325 bool IsGlobalEmpty() const;
326
327 size_t PushSegmentSize() const { return push_segment_->Size(); }
328
329 void Publish();
330
331 void Merge(Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Local& other);
332
333 void Clear();
334
335 private:
336 void PublishPushSegment();
337 void PublishPopSegment();
338 bool StealPopSegment();
339
340 Segment* NewSegment() const {
341 // Bottleneck for filtering in crash dumps.
342 return Segment::Create(MinSegmentSize);
343 }
344 void DeleteSegment(internal::SegmentBase* segment) const {
345 if (segment == internal::SegmentBase::GetSentinelSegmentAddress()) return;
346 Segment::Delete(static_cast<Segment*>(segment));
347 }
348
349 inline Segment* push_segment() {
350 DCHECK_NE(internal::SegmentBase::GetSentinelSegmentAddress(),
351 push_segment_);
352 return static_cast<Segment*>(push_segment_);
353 }
354 inline const Segment* push_segment() const {
355 DCHECK_NE(internal::SegmentBase::GetSentinelSegmentAddress(),
356 push_segment_);
357 return static_cast<const Segment*>(push_segment_);
358 }
359
360 inline Segment* pop_segment() {
361 DCHECK_NE(internal::SegmentBase::GetSentinelSegmentAddress(), pop_segment_);
362 return static_cast<Segment*>(pop_segment_);
363 }
364 inline const Segment* pop_segment() const {
365 DCHECK_NE(internal::SegmentBase::GetSentinelSegmentAddress(), pop_segment_);
366 return static_cast<const Segment*>(pop_segment_);
367 }
368
369 Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>& worklist_;
370 internal::SegmentBase* push_segment_ = nullptr;
371 internal::SegmentBase* pop_segment_ = nullptr;
372};
373
374template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
375Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Local::Local(
376 Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>& worklist)
377 : worklist_(worklist),
378 push_segment_(internal::SegmentBase::GetSentinelSegmentAddress()),
379 pop_segment_(internal::SegmentBase::GetSentinelSegmentAddress()) {}
380
381template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
382Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Local::~Local() {
383 CHECK_IMPLIES(push_segment_, push_segment_->IsEmpty());
384 CHECK_IMPLIES(pop_segment_, pop_segment_->IsEmpty());
385 DeleteSegment(push_segment_);
386 DeleteSegment(pop_segment_);
387}
388
389template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
390void Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Local::Push(EntryType entry) {
391 if (V8_UNLIKELY(push_segment_->IsFull())) {
392 PublishPushSegment();
393 push_segment_ = NewSegment();
394 }
395 push_segment()->Push(entry);
396}
397
398template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
399bool Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Local::Pop(EntryType* entry) {
400 if (pop_segment_->IsEmpty()) {
401 if (!push_segment_->IsEmpty()) {
402 std::swap(push_segment_, pop_segment_);
403 } else if (!StealPopSegment()) {
404 return false;
405 }
406 }
407 pop_segment()->Pop(entry);
408 return true;
409}
410
411template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
412bool Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Local::IsLocalAndGlobalEmpty() const {
413 return IsLocalEmpty() && IsGlobalEmpty();
414}
415
416template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
417bool Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Local::IsLocalEmpty() const {
418 return push_segment_->IsEmpty() && pop_segment_->IsEmpty();
419}
420
421template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
422bool Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Local::IsGlobalEmpty() const {
423 return worklist_.IsEmpty();
424}
425
426template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
427void Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Local::Publish() {
428 if (!push_segment_->IsEmpty()) {
429 PublishPushSegment();
430 push_segment_ = internal::SegmentBase::GetSentinelSegmentAddress();
431 }
432 if (!pop_segment_->IsEmpty()) {
433 PublishPopSegment();
434 pop_segment_ = internal::SegmentBase::GetSentinelSegmentAddress();
435 }
436}
437
438template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
439void Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Local::Merge(
440 Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Local& other) {
441 worklist_.Merge(other.worklist_);
442}
443
444template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
445void Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Local::PublishPushSegment() {
446 if (push_segment_ != internal::SegmentBase::GetSentinelSegmentAddress())
447 worklist_.Push(push_segment());
448}
449
450template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
451void Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Local::PublishPopSegment() {
452 if (pop_segment_ != internal::SegmentBase::GetSentinelSegmentAddress())
453 worklist_.Push(pop_segment());
454}
455
456template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
457bool Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Local::StealPopSegment() {
458 if (worklist_.IsEmpty()) return false;
459 Segment* new_segment = nullptr;
460 if (worklist_.Pop(&new_segment)) {
461 DeleteSegment(pop_segment_);
462 pop_segment_ = new_segment;
463 return true;
464 }
465 return false;
466}
467
468template <typename EntryType, uint16_t MinSegmentSize>
469void Worklist<EntryType, MinSegmentSize>::Local::Clear() {
470 push_segment_->Clear();
471 pop_segment_->Clear();
472}
473
474} // namespace heap::base
